docs.snippet: The blast at Minnehaha Academy, which happened after builders frantically warned of a gas leak, killed a receptionist and a part-time janitor.

docs.snippet: Three people were hurt, and the driver was arrested. The activists had attended a vigil for a transgender woman who was fatally shot by the police.

docs.snippet: Times readers debated the process of deciding which heirlooms parents should pass down to their children, and what to do when the children say no thanks.

docs.snippet: She is a fifth-grade teacher, and he is an advertising account executive for ESPN.

docs.snippet: The Constitutional Court ruled that President Jimmy Morales could not remove the commissioner of a United Nations panel that has accused him of violating campaign finance laws.

docs.snippet: The theater will no longer show the film as part of its summer series because of concerns of the film’s racial insensitivity.
